import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List drivers with pagination"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/drivers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



FindAll handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve driver records with optional filtering and pagination.
It supports filtering by either "ulid" or "teamId" query parameters, but not both simultaneously.
If both filters are provided, it returns a 400 Bad Request error.
Pagination is controlled via "page" and "page_size" query parameters, with defaults and limits applied.
Returns a JSON response containing the paginated drivers or an error message.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Page number (default: 1)","in":"query","name":"page","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"description":"Page size (default: 10, max: 100)","in":"query","name":"page_size","schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"data":{"items":{"properties":{"correlation_id":{"type":"string"},"created_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"},"deleted_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"},"id":{"type":"integer"},"name":{"type":"string"},"ulid":{"type":"string"},"updated_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"page":{"type":"integer"},"page_size":{"type":"integer"},"total_items":{"type":"integer"},"total_pages":{"type":"integer"}},"type":"object"}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
